metadata.name: Outgoing Logon with New Credentials
metadata.comment: Detects logon events that specify new credentials

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND metadata.event_code = 4624 AND logon_type = 9)

output.summary: Detects logon events that specify new credentials

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate remote administration activity Reference: https://go.recordedfuture.com/hubfs/reports/mtp-2021-0914.pdf
